title: Bubble Pop Electric
description: A creamy, high-shine lip gloss with buildable color and a multidimensional, mirror-like finish for the illusion of a fuller, plumper pout.
Bubble Pop Electric is a high-performance lip gloss with a rich, ultra-smooth formula containing spherical powders for even application and superior wet, glass-like shine.
The creamy, cushiony texture melts into lips, wrapping them in comfortable, non-sticky luminous color that won’t move or bleed.

title: I'm Still Here
description: A creamy, high-shine lip gloss with buildable color and a multidimensional, mirror-like finish for the illusion of a fuller, plumper pout.
Bubble Pop Electric is a high-performance lip gloss with a rich, ultra-smooth formula containing spherical powders for even application and superior wet, glass-like shine.
The creamy, cushiony texture melts into lips, wrapping them in comfortable, non-sticky luminous color that won’t move or bleed.

title: Original Me
description: A luxurious, high-performance lipstick with high color payoff and a velvety matte finish.
Get Gwen’s signature lip or build your own with this luxurious lipstick available in brights and nudes that gives ultra-rich payoff and a velvety matte finish.
The intensely pigmented formula glides on smoothly for bold, stay-true color in one swipe.
Wears comfortably and stays put all day—no fading or feathering.
Like all One products, this lipstick is vegan, cruelty-free, and formulated clean.

title: Anaheim Shine
description: A cushiony, high-performance lipstick with rich color payoff and a smooth-as-silk satin finish.
Recreate Gwen’s signature lip look or build your own with this high-performance satin lipstick available in brights and nudes.
With richly pigmented, stay-true color in just one swipe, this silky, cushiony formula glides smoothly onto lips and wears comfortably all day.
Like all One products, this lipstick is vegan, cruelty-free, and formulated clean.

title: Dewyplump Collagen Lip Gel
description: The shine of a gloss. The texture of a gel.
The hydration of a lip serum. More Than Gloss.
A Collagen-Boosting Treatment.
Our all-clean, 100% vegan Collagen Lip Gel drenches even the driest lips in nutrient-rich plumping moisture, a weightless cushiony texture and a juicy hint of non-sticky, high-shine color.

title: Anaheim Line
description: Easily line, fill & shape lips with rich, stay-true color and comfortable wear.
This classic precision pencil glides effortlessly over lips, no skipping or tugging, while the waterproof formula stays put.
Layers seamlessly under lipstick or lip gloss, preventing color from bleeding or feathering.

title: Spark The Fire
description: This hydrating balm adds a glaze of color, shine, and a warm tingling sensation.

A natural-origin plumping agent derived from pomegranate flower is proven to increase lip volume instantly & over time, while deeply moisturizing oils and sodium hyaluronate, nourish and banish dryness.

title: Xtra Sauce
description: This longwear liquid lipstick locks in high-impact, saturated color & lacquered shine—in Gwen’s iconic red.
Once dry, the transfer-proof formula is soft and flexible, moving comfortably with lips, giving a vinyl-like shiny finish that stays with you all day.
Vegan, cruelty-free, & formulated clean.

title: Double Dippin
description: This longwear liquid lipstick locks in high-impact, saturated color & lacquered shine—in Gwen’s iconic red.
Once dry, the transfer-proof formula is soft and flexible, moving comfortably with lips, giving a vinyl-like shiny finish that stays with you all day.
Vegan, cruelty-free, & formulated clean.

title: All Time Prime
description: Create a smooth, dewy complexion with this hydrating, lightweight, non-comedogenic, multi-use skin-prepping & priming oil.
This lightweight, multi-use oil delivers 24 hours of hydration and a visibly smoother, dewy complexion.
Use alone to prep and prime skin, or mix with your foundation for a hydration boost.
This formula contains omega-rich oils, plus skin-soothing aloe & meadowfoam seed oil.
Like all One products, this facial oil is vegan, cruelty-free, and formulated clean.

title: Dewyplump Collagen Cheek Tint
description: Our high-performance liquid blush glides on and melts in—depositing skin-loving moisture, a buildable blendable formula and decadently creamy, luminous color.

title: Check My Glow
description: A gradient of shimmering, creamy powders ranging from subtle satin to show-stopping holographic creates a universally flattering glow.
The silky-smooth formula melts into skin, diffusing light for a lit-from-within, radiant highlight.
Multidimensional pigments can be worn on the face, body, or eyes.

title: Pick It Up
description: So easy to use, you’ll be sculpted in seconds.
Hydrating cream contour is formulated with Squalene and Cellulose to glide on, giving you instant lift.
Silky soft-matte powder bronzer blends seamlessly for natural, sunkissed warmth.
Made to layer effortlessly for a smooth finish, never streaky.

title: Staring Mascara
description: An ultra-black clean mascara that lengthens, lifts, and separates from root to tip for thicker, longer, natural-looking lashes.
Created to maximize every single lash, the precision brush grabs & separates lashes at the root adding length, lift, & definition without the clumps.

The ultra-lightweight, vegan formula keeps lashes lifted and touchably soft while deep black clean pigments stay put no flaking or smudging In a consumer study with 34 people immediately after 1 application: 97% saw lengthened and lifted lashes 97% saw thicker lashes 97% saw root-to-tip curl.

title: Line It Up
description: A waterproof eyeliner gel pencil with bold, high-impact pigment.
The creamy formula glides on smoothly & blends out seamlessly for even, controlled application and high-performance color.
Allows for some play time before it dries down to 24-hour wear that won’t budge.
Like all One products, this eye liner is vegan, cruelty-free, and formulated clean.

title: Pout to Get Real
short: Matte Lip Liner With Dual-ended Lip Brush
description: Chisel-tipped lip liner with dual-ended lip brush to easily overline and contour lips for the look of a fuller, more defined pout.

This retractable lip liner is designed with a precision tip to easily sculpt lips into desired shape, a flat edge to fill lips with rich, comfortable color, and a lip brush to blend and diffuse harsh lines.
Layers seamlessly under lip gloss or lipstick to create the illusion of naturally fuller lips.

title: Hella on Point
short: Ultra-Fine Eyebrow Pencil For Natural Brows
description: Create natural-looking full, feathery brows with this long-wearing, transfer-proof, and sweat-proof precision eyebrow pencil.
A clean, precision brow pencil for natural, full, feathery brows.
The super-slim micro tip glides on easily, delivering ultra-fine, hair-like strokes that can fill even the smallest of gaps.
Its super-soft formula delivers color that stays put for up to 12 hours of longwear.
Plus, it's transfer-proof and sweat-proof.
Like all One products, this eyebrow pencil is vegan, cruelty-free, and formulated clean.

title: Paint It Up
description: A buildable, cream-to-powder eyeshadow with built-in eye primer technology for crease-proof, smudge-proof, fade-resistant color and 24-hour wear.
Squeeze a pea sized amount onto the back of the hand, fingertips, or directly onto a brush.
Gently pat over the lid using a finger or use a dense shadow brush to swipe over lids, beginning at the center and blending outwards.

title: Eye See In Color
description: Highly-pigmented, rich, buttery, blendable quad eyeshadow palettes in four curated shades, made to customize for every occasion.
These high-pigment eyeshadows were color-curated to easily create complete eye looks in just one palette—from subtle nude to dramatic smoky and everything in between.
The blendable, creamy, and no-crease formulas give ultra-rich color payoff in buttery, multidimensional finishes.
Apply with fingers or brushes. Like all One Beauty products, these eye shadows are vegan, cruelty-free, and formulated clean.

title: Most Def
short: Instant Definition Sculpting Eyebrow Pencil For Bold Brows
description: Create defined and sculpted brows instantly with this easy-to-use chisel-tipped brow pencil that’s long-wearing, transfer-proof, and sweat-proof.
A clean eyebrow pencil that fills, shapes, and sculpts brows for easy, instant definition.
Its wide-angled, chisel-shaped tip allows for controlled sculpting and filling, smoothly gliding on transfer-proof, sweatproof color for up to 12 hours.
Includes a shaping spoolie brush. Like all One products, this eyebrow pencil is vegan, cruelty-free, and formulated clean.
